#Download Tweets
```{r}
TL <- searchTwitter("educational data mining", n=50, since='2016-09-12', until='2016-09-20')
TL <- do.call("rbind", lapply(TL, as.data.frame))
```

```{r}
counts=table(TL$screenName)
barplot(counts, las=2)

#By time of day
hist(TL$created, breaks = "d")
```
